titles.title: Advancing Education on Biosimilars Act of 2020
Advancing Education on Biosimilars Act of 2020
Advancing Education on Biosimilars Act of 2020
Advancing Education on Biosimilars Act of 2019
A bill to educate health care providers and the public on biosimilar biological products, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.
Senate Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment by Unanimous Consent.

reference.label: text of amendment in the nature of a substitute

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

term.name: Drug safety, medical device, and laboratory regulation

bill.summary:
Advancing Education on Biosimilars Act of 2019
This bill addresses education for the public and for health care providers regarding biosimilars. (Biosimilars are biological products approved by the Food and Drug Administration based on their similarity to an already approved biological product.)
The bill requires the Department of Health and Human Services (HHS) to create a website for educational materials on the meaning and use of biosimilars and interchangeable biological products.
HHS must also develop or improve continuing medical education programs for health care providers regarding biosimilars.
